About the Company: The Lakshmi Vilas Bank Limited (LVB) was founded eight decades ago ( in 1926) mainly to cater to the financial needs of varied customer segments. The bank was incorporated on November 03, 1926. The Bank operates in four segments: treasury operations, corporate/wholesale banking operations, retail banking operations and other banking operations. Its wealth management services include life Insurance, General Insurance, Mutual Funds & PMS, Money Transfer through Branch Channels, Money Transfer through Direct Remittances, Investment & Infrastructure Bonds, PAN Card Services, Depository Participant Services, New Pension System (NPS) and applications supported by blocked amounts (ASPA).
